meaningMnemonic: You need <kanji>art</kanji> <kanji>technique</kanji>s to make <vocabulary>art</vocabulary>. Without art techniques, <vocabulary>the arts</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>fine art</vocabulary> simply wouldn’t exist.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
